caption.center: CORNELIUS W.H. ELTING, Respondent, v. CHARLES W. DAYTON, Appellant.

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.attorneys:
Charles E. Patterson for appellant.
John J. Linson for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Agree to affirm; no opinion.
All concur.
Order affirmed.
